item.title: I have it added why wont it work?
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

lol it dont know what static means…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2008, 10:08:15 PM[/size][hr]

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 914) { // Infernal
// Mage

staticAnimation(369, p.absX, p.absY, 100);
hitDiff = 14 + misc.random(28);
}

i had to add p.absx cause it didnt know what it meant without it and also now it says

NPCHandler.java:799: cannot find symbol symbol : method staticAnimation(int,int,int,int) location: class NPCHandler staticAnimation(369, p.absX, p.absY, 100); ^

item.title: I have it added why wont it work?
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

yea no shit

this is what my kbd looks like i didn’t test him yet he came on server already so i didnt make

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50) { // KBD
try {
p.animation(0, p.absY, p.absX); // Flames
client player = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
int bonus = misc.random(player.playerBonus[5]);
int dragon_bonus = misc.random(828);
if (dragon_bonus > bonus) {
hitDiff = misc.random(56);
}
int random = misc.random(5);
if (random == 1) {
for (int i = 0; i < npcs[NPCID].Killing.length; i++) {
client player2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[i];
if ((player2 != null)
&& (npcs[NPCID].Killing[i] > 0)) {
int x = player2.absX;
int y = player2.absY;
// if(Math.abs(npcs[NPCID].absX
// - x) <= 50 ||
// Math.abs(npcs[NPCID].absY -
// y) <= 50){
player2.hitDiff = misc.random(60);
player2.updateRequired = true;
player2.hitUpdateRequired = true;
player2.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
try {
player2
.sendMessage(“The enraged dragon’s flames burn you!”);
} catch (Exception e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
// }
}
}
}
